Email or username must be provided: 用户名或邮箱不能为空
The address is not linked to any account: 地址未关联到任何帐号
Invalid username. It should start with a: 用户名不符合要求。请使用英文字母、数字、下划线，并且长度在 3 ~ 16 字符内。
The email is not associated with any acc: 邮箱未关联到任何帐号
The new password must be different from: 新密码不能与旧密码相同
Withdraw address is illegal: 提现地址不是有效的地址
The account is already linked with one a: 此帐号已连接了一个地址
The address is already used by another a: 此地址已被另一帐号使用
The address not linking with this accoun: 此地址未连接到本帐号
Title must be no more than %d characters: 标题不能多于 %d 字数
Someone mention you in comment: 有人在评论中提及了您
Someone mention you in post: 有人在主题中提及了您
